isis.stitle: FRONT STEER AXLE: EATON E1200I I-BEAM - LUBRICATION - WHEEL BEARINGS

svcproc.title: WHEEL BEARINGS
svcproc.para: Lubricate wheel bearings with an approved drive axle lubricant (oil bath) or heavy duty grease (grease packed) depending on the type of axle lube system. Identify the type of lubrication system on your vehicle before servicing wheel bearings. Improper lubrication can result in reduced seal life and potential damage to bearings and spindles.
Refer to GROUP 02 - HUBS, BEARINGS AND SEALS in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual and GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION for recommended lubes and intervals.

note.para: Do not mix lubricants of different grades. Do not mix mineral and synthetic lubes. Different brands of the same grade may be mixed. Do not pack bearings with grease when using an oil bath system. This practice can restrict the flow of the lubricant to the wheel seal.
